doc:
Tony Marshall (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Marshall_(actor) 0 Anthony Marshall (born 14 May 1964) is a British television actor. He is probably best known for his appearance in the BBC drama series Life on Mars and the final episode of its spinoff Ashes to Ashes as the bartender and confidant, Nelson and Rodney's friend Chris in Only Fools and Horses. Previously, he played Diesel in all three series of Preston Front he also star in the 2003 Christmas special of My Family. He starred in the 1999 TV film 'The Flint Street Nativity'. Since 2008 he has been starring in Casualty as the receptionist, Noel Garcia. On 14 March 2017, Marshall appeared as Noel on Sister Show Holby City Anthony_Marshall ( born 14_May_1964 ) is a_British_television_actor . He is_probably_best_known for his_appearance in the_BBC_drama_series_Life on Mars and the_final_episode of its_spinoff_Ashes to Ashes as the_bartender_and_confidant , Nelson and Rodney 's_friend Chris in Only_Fools_and_Horses . Previously , he played Diesel in all_three_series of Preston_Front he also star in the_2003_Christmas_special of My_Family . He starred in the_1999_TV_film ' The_Flint_Street_Nativity ' . Since 2008 he has_been_starring in Casualty as the_receptionist , Noel_Garcia .
